human: What was written on this page?

gpt:
The page contains the following handwritten text:

RICHARD NIXON
577 CHESNUT RIDGE ROAD
WOODCLIFF LAKE, NEW JERSEY
1-23-89

Dear Mr. Bueerman,
The magnificent orchid
blossom in this world
has a special place in
our home.
We are grateful
for your support over
the years -
Sincerely,
[Signature: Richard Nixon]
